title: Sigourney Weaver joins Ghostbusters reboot
text:
By Sadie Gennis, Sigourney Weaver has become the latest original Ghostbusters star to sign on for the anticipated reboot. Director Paul Feig shared the exciting news on Twitter Friday.
Gang, trying to keep surprises but this is about to leak, so I'll tell you myself: the awesome Sigourney Weaver is going to be in our movie!
â€” Paul Feig (@paulfeig) September 25, 2015
Weaver, who played Dana Barrett, joins Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd and Ernie Hudson as returning actors to the franchise. Kate McKinnon , Kristen Wiig , Melissa McCarthy , Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth star in the upcoming reboot, which hits theaters on July 22, 2016.
